title: Ticket #4220: Personal Condor Test startup changes
description: In getting the gsi test running again the verification that the personal condor is up can not run the normal path because condor_who(which we rely oon) does not speak GSI. So we add a flag to the call in CondorTest::StartCondorWithParams and the built in way is not called and the test does its own validation. A similar issue involves the desire to split the configure and start personal condor to configure, do some stuff and then start
